中式特种作战突击步枪
ACR 18" 精确射手步枪,瞄准镜
ACR 16" 战斗步枪,光学瞄具
ACR 18" 精确射手步枪,光学瞄具
ACR 模组套件 - 狙击镜
ACR 模组套件 - 16英寸枪管(12.7mm)
ACR 模组套件 - 10.5英寸枪管(5mm)
ACR 模组套件 - 14.5英寸枪管(5.56)
ACR 模组套件 - 18英寸枪管(.308)

original: ACR Mod Kit - Hybrid ACOG Scope
translation: ACR 模组套件 - 混合先进光学瞄准镜

original: For a good while, the deal I bargained with the feinds has been lucrative and relatively stable. Lately however, the supplies left at the drop spot have been rather lacking. I don't know why they dropped off, and I'd be an idiot to try to renegotiate with psychopaths. Maybe I'll hire a merc to act as an inbetween.
translation: 在很长一段时间里，我与恶魔帮达成的协议利润丰厚，而且相对稳定。然而，最近留在投放点的物资相当匮乏。我不知道他们为什么会减少，如果我想和那些疯子重新谈判，那我就是个白痴。也许我会雇一个雇佣兵做中间人。

original: Originally developed by Nevadatech, this devastating heavy weapon annihilates whatever you aim it at. Fires a heavy slug that creates a large explosion on impact.\n\nZach's Notes: Clearly the result of needing more power armor friendly weapons. I wonder what else this mysterious "Nevadatech" was cooking up.
translation: 这种毁灭性的重型武器最初是由内华达科技公司开发的，它能消灭你瞄准的任何物体。发射一枚重型弹头，撞击时产生巨大爆炸。\n\n扎克的注释：显然这是需要更多对动力装甲友好的武器的结果。我想知道这个神秘的“内华达科技公司”还在酝酿什么。

original: The "Adaptive Combat Rifle" can use special ACR Mod Kits to hot swap different barrels and optics. Standard weapon mods are also available.\n\nZach's Notes: The quick change barrel idea is pretty genius. From what I heard, the old company bought out the rights to this gun and perfected it's ambitious engineering. There's a reason we issue these to our guards. It's good.
translation: “自适应战斗步枪”可以使用特殊的ACR模组套件来热插拔不同的枪管和光学装置。标准武器模组也可以使用。\n\n扎克的注释：快速更换枪管的想法相当天才。据我所知，这家老公司买下了这把枪的所有权，并完善了它雄心勃勃的工程设计。我们把这些发给守卫是有原因的，这个非常好。

original: A classic semi-auto sniper rifle. It's sturdy construction and materials have preserved it for many years.\n\nZach's Notes: The old reliable. Find these all the time out in the wild, many of them still having their pre-war parts. Sturdy fuckin guns.
translation: 经典的半自动狙击步枪，坚固的结构和材料使它保存了很多年。\n\n扎克的注释：老可靠。在野外经常能找到它们，很多还保留着战前的部分。这枪真他妈耐用。

original: This submachine gun saw widespread use amongst law enforcement, unsavory criminals, and everyone inbetween. A reliable SMG platform that has stood the test of time. Comes in 3 varieties, a 9mm, a 10mm, and a 9mm with an integrated suppressor.\n\nZach's Notes: The germans knew what they were doing when they made this. Probably one of our best sellers too. Easy to find them and refurbish them.
translation: 这把冲锋枪被广泛使用在执法部门，臭名昭著的罪犯，以及所有人之间。可靠的SMG平台，经得起时间的考验。有3个品种，一个9mm，一个10mm，和一个9mm集成抑制器。\n\n扎克的注释：德国人在制造这个的时候知道他们在做什么。可能也是我们最畅销的产品之一。很容易找到并翻新它们。

original: A pistol that utilizes 5mm rounds. \n\nZach's Notes: Didn't seem to be terribly popular in it's hey day, but picked up steam when armor became more commonplace. Holds a lot of bullets for a pistol.
translation: 一种使用5毫米子弹的手枪。\n\n扎克的注释：在它的鼎盛时期似乎不太受欢迎，但当护甲变得更加普遍时，它就开始流行起来，能装很多手枪子弹。

original: A submachine gun that fires 5mm rounds at a very high fire rate. Ambidexterous and a great performer in close quarters combat.\n\nZach's Notes: These little spitfires are fantastic. Shreds anything that dare's come close.
translation: 一种冲锋枪，以非常高的射速发射5毫米子弹。双手使用都很灵巧，在近距离战斗中表现出色。\n\n扎克的注释：这些小喷火战斗机太棒了，能粉碎任何敢靠近的东西。

original: One of the most well known semi-auto .50 cal sniper rifles. Originally developed as an anti-vehicle rifle. It saw increased use with the adapting of power armor due to units being able to handle the immense weight and recoil.\n\nZach's Notes: Absolutely destructive, and absurdly heavy. If you want something to not exist, this is a good candidate for the job.
translation: 最著名的.50口径半自动狙击步枪之一，最初是作为反载具步枪开发的。随着动力装甲的调整，它的使用越来越多，因为单位能够处理巨大的重量和后坐力。\n\n扎克的注释：绝对是毁灭性的，而且非常重。如果你希望某些东西不存在，这是一个很好的选择。

original: After a grueling journey I've finally made it back to the Mojave. I don't want to let Zach know just yet though. I need to get some things sorted first and I don't need his moral high-roading getting in the way of business. I will need him though. My tech work is shit, and he'll be happy sitting in a closet fiddling with guns all day. \n\nI found this abandonded storefront with a 2nd floor to set up this terminal in for now. It's got good bones. Not the biggest fan of Westside, but it seems a good a place as any without some gang boss or local politician to boss me around.
translation: 经过一段艰辛的旅程，我终于回到了莫哈维。但我还不想让扎克知道，我得先把事情处理好，免得他的道德准则妨碍我做生意。不过我需要他，我的技术工作烂透了，他会很乐意整天坐在壁橱里摆弄枪支的。\n\n我找到了一个废弃的店面，有一个二楼，现在可以设置这个终端。它的结构很好，我不是西区的头号粉丝，但这似乎是个不错的地方，不会有黑帮老大或当地政客对我指手画脚。

original: Today I'm packing up the last of my things here at the 188 Trading Post. I've been earning a modest living there dealing with some small volume of our family's weapons, but the time has come to move on. \n\nZoey moved back from Arroyo a few weeks ago. She says she's found a place to rebuild the family's legacy in Westside. She's going to take over sales and distribution which leaves me more time for repairing and tinkering. I'm tired of dealing with hagglers and shitty customers anyway. She says I'll have my own workshop floor. I hope she isn't bullshitting me this time.
translation: 今天我要去188贸易站收拾最后的东西。我一直在那里处理少量的家族武器，勉强维持生计，但现在是时候继续前进了。\n\n佐伊几周前从阿罗约搬回来了，她说她在西区找到了一个重建家族遗产的地方。她将接管销售和分销，这样我就有更多的时间来修理和改装。反正我也厌倦了跟那些讨价还价的人和垃圾顾客打交道。她说我会有自己的车间，希望她这次不是在骗我。

original: The "Leilong" Railgun was an unfinished prototype made by the Chinese government that was never completed before the Great War. Somehow a shipment of these models made their way stateside post war, and with some wasteland ingenuity and engineering were able to be completed.\n\nZach's Notes: The Chinese were way ahead of miniaturization tech than the US was. Had to compensate by rigging some extra wiring on the exterior. Does the trick. The magazine/battery hybrid is a bit janky but it does work.
translation: “雷龙”轨道炮是中国政府制造的一个未完成的原型，在战前一直没有完工。战后，这些模型以某种方式运抵美国，在一些废土的独创性和工程学的帮助下得以完成。\n\n扎克的注释：中国在小型化技术方面远远领先于美国。为了弥补这一点，我不得不在外部安装一些额外的电线，很有效。弹匣/电池的混合有点简陋，但它确实能工作。

original: Well, turns out Zoey surpassed my expectations! I have nearly everything I could ever need to restore and rebuild any weapon I want, including energy weapons! I managed to get my hands on a few of these Chinese railguns. They're currently not functioning, but with some extra engineering I think I can make something work.
translation: 果然，佐伊超出了我的预期！我几乎拥有了我所需要的一切去恢复和重建任何我想要的武器，包括能量武器！我设法弄到了一些这种中国轨道炮。它们目前不能正常工作，但通过一些额外的工程，我想我可以其中一些工作。

original: I knew it, it was too good to be true. All these gun parts coming in seemed a bit suspicious, especially considering how many people actually come through to trade. Zoey being Zoey made a deal with the worst people possible. Fiends! Those drug crazed raider lunatics! Apparently we have to dead drop these scum a shipment of chems south of here in a dumpster, and they leave weapons and materials in exchange. How she actually arranged all this, I'll never know. Maybe I don't want to.
translation: 我就知道，这太好了，不可能是真的。所有这些枪支零件看起来都有点可疑，尤其是考虑到有多少人真的来交易。佐伊就是佐伊，和最邪恶的人做了生意，恶魔帮！那群吸毒的掠夺者！显然我们得把一批化学品扔到南边的垃圾箱里，然后让他们留下武器和材料作为交换。她究竟是如何安排这一切的，我永远不会知道。也许我不想知道。

original: It's been a lot of work between Zach and I, but we finally did it. Even hired a few locals to act as guards. I'm sure the free ACRs and combat armor was a nice signing bonus. Most of the local militia is ragtag. Business early on has been very successful.
translation: 我和扎克做了很多努力，但我们终于做到了。甚至雇了几个当地人当警卫，我相信免费的ACR和战斗装甲是一个不错的签约奖金，当地的民兵大多是乌合之众。早期的业务非常成功。

original: You know the phrase "Suffering from Success"? Turns out our guns are very popular. So much so that we're having problems keeping a running stock. I don't want to reduce myself to selling weapons that aren't attached to our family legacy, or chems. I gotta pay these guards, and Zach, somehow.
translation: 你知道“成功源自苦难”这句话吗？原来我们的枪很受欢迎。太受欢迎了，以至于我们很难保持库存。我不想让自己沦落到卖与家族遗产无关的武器，或者化学药品的境地。我得发工资给这些警卫，还有扎克。

original: I had a run in with a group of fiends coming back from an errand. It could have ended badly for either of us, but I managed to barter us into a deal that solves a lot of our problems. We have a surplus of chems we don't want to sell in our store. They live out in the wastes, scavenging and looting. I know I shouldn't trust these crazed addict raiders but their whole attitude changed when I mentioned our chem supply. So we worked out a deal. We leave chems at a designated drop point, they leave weapons, scrap and materials.
translation: 我和一群外出办事回来的恶魔帮发生了冲突。对我们双方来说，结局都可能很糟糕，但我设法把做成了一笔交易，解决了我们之间的很多问题。我们有多余的药物，我不想在店里卖。他们住在荒郊野地里，四处搜刮和抢劫。我知道我不应该相信这些疯狂的瘾君子，但是当我提到我们的化学药物补给时他们的态度完全改变了。所以我们达成了协议，我们把化学药物放在指定的投放点，他们留下武器、废料和材料。

original: I want to browse your goods.
You do not have an ACR equipped.
You are already using this attachment.
translation: 你已经在使用这个附件了。

original: Increases damage, compatible with Railgun & Coil Blunderbuss.
translation: 增加伤害，与轨道炮和线圈炮兼容。

original: Chinese Sniper Rifle Carbon Fiber Parts
translation: 中式狙击步枪碳纤维部件

original: Decreases spread (-33.33%), adds laser sight effect.
translation: 降低子弹散布(-33.33%)，增加激光瞄准效果。
海军冲锋枪红点瞄准镜

original: Decreases spread (-33.33%), adds a red dot sight with mount.
translation: 降低子弹散布(-33.33%)，添加一个红点瞄具。

original: Silences weapon, compatible with multiple pistols & SMGs.
translation: 静音武器。兼容多种手枪和冲锋枪。

original: Silences weapon, compatible with all ACRs.
Decreases spread (-33.33%), adds laser sight effect.
translation: 降低子弹散布(-33.33%)，增加激光瞄准效果。
中式特种作战扩展弹匣

original: Increases ammunition capacity, compatible with VSS & AS Val.
translation: 增加弹药容量，与VSS和AS Val兼容。
中式特种作战反射瞄具

original: Decreases spread (-33.33%), adds a green dot sight with mount.
translation: 降低子弹散布(-33.33%)，添加一个绿点瞄具。
中式防暴冲锋枪高级弹匣
雷龙轨道炮热成像瞄准镜

original: MP5 Submachine Gun Red Dot Sight

scn ZLArmamentsRenamingScript

Begin GameMode
	if GetGameRestarted
		if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:bLoreFriendlyNamesOnly" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 0
			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iRailgun" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "Leilong Railgun" ZLWeapRailgun

				SetName "Leilong Railgun Suppressor" ZLModRailgunSuppressor
				SetName "Leilong Railgun Thermal Scope" ZLModRailgunThermalScope
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iP90" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "P90" ZLWeapP90
				SetName "P90 Extended Barrel" ZLModP90ExtBarrel
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iSVD" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "SVD" ZLWeapSVD

				SetName "SVD Suppressor" ZLModSVDSuppressor
				SetName "SVD Carbon Fiber Parts" ZLModSVDCarbonFiberParts
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iFiveseveN" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "FiveseveN" ZLWeapFiveseveN

				SetName "FiveseveN Reinforced Lower Body" ZLModFiveseveNReinforcedLower

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iFiveseveN" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "FN FiveseveN" ZLWeapFiveseveN

				SetName "FN FiveseveN Reinforced Lower Body" ZLModFiveseveNReinforcedLower
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5A5" ZLWeapMP5

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5A5 Submachine Gun" ZLWeapMP5
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5/10" ZLWeapMP510

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5/10 Submachine Gun" ZLWeapMP510
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5SD6" ZLWeapMP5SD6

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5SD6 Submachine Gun" ZLWeapMP5SD6
			endif

			if (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1)
				SetName "MP5 Full Stock" ZLModMP5FullStock
				SetName "MP5 Red Dot Sight" ZLModMP5RedDotSight
			endif

			if (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2)
				SetName "MP5 Submachine Gun Full Stock" ZLModMP5FullStock
				SetName "MP5 Submachine Gun Red Dot Sight" ZLModMP5RedDotSight
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iM82A1" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "M82A1" ZLWeapM82A1

				SetName "M82A1 Long Barrel" ZLModM82A1Barrel
				SetName "M82A1 Custom Bolt" ZLModM82A1CustomBolt
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iVSS" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "VSS" ZLWeapVSS
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iASVal" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "AS Val" ZLWeapASVal
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iJericho941" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "Jericho 941" ZLWeapJericho941
				SetName "Jericho 941 Wooden Grip" ZLModJericho941WoodGrip
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iPP19Bizon" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "PP-19 Bizon" ZLWeapPP19Bizon
				SetName "PP-19 Bizon Advanced Magazine" ZLModPP19BizonMag
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iNeostead2000" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "Neostead 2000" ZLWeapNeostead2000
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:i5mmSuppressor" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "5.7x28mm Suppressor" ZLMod5mmSuppressor
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iPSO1Scope" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "PSO-1 Scope" ZLModPSO1Scope
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:i9x39mmExtMag" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "9x39mm Extended Mags" ZLMod9x39mmExtMag
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iOKP7ReflexSight" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "OKP-7 Reflex Sight" ZLModOKP7ReflexSight
			endif

			if GetDebugMode
				Print "ZL Armaments: Weapon Renaming Complete"
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
translation:
scn ZLArmamentsRenamingScript

Begin GameMode
	if GetGameRestarted
		if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:bLoreFriendlyNamesOnly" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 0
			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iRailgun" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "雷龙轨道炮" ZLWeapRailgun

				SetName "雷龙轨道炮消音器" ZLModRailgunSuppressor
				SetName "雷龙轨道炮热成像瞄准镜" ZLModRailgunThermalScope
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iP90" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "P90" ZLWeapP90
				SetName "P90加长枪管" ZLModP90ExtBarrel
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iSVD" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "SVD" ZLWeapSVD

				SetName "SVD消音器" ZLModSVDSuppressor
				SetName "SVD碳纤维部件" ZLModSVDCarbonFiberParts
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iFiveseveN" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "FiveseveN手枪" ZLWeapFiveseveN

				SetName "FiveseveN手枪加强下枪身" ZLModFiveseveNReinforcedLower

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iFiveseveN" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "FN FiveseveN手枪" ZLWeapFiveseveN

				SetName "FiveseveN手枪加强下枪身" ZLModFiveseveNReinforcedLower
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5A5" ZLWeapMP5

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5A5冲锋枪" ZLWeapMP5
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5/10" ZLWeapMP510

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5/10冲锋枪" ZLWeapMP510
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "MP5SD6" ZLWeapMP5SD6

			elseif GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2
				SetName "MP5SD6冲锋枪" ZLWeapMP5SD6
			endif

			if (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1)
				SetName "MP5完整枪托" ZLModMP5FullStock
				SetName "MP5红点瞄准镜" ZLModMP5RedDotSight
			endif

			if (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP510" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2) || (GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iMP5SD6" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 2)
				SetName "MP5冲锋枪完整枪托" ZLModMP5FullStock
				SetName "MP5冲锋枪红点瞄准镜" ZLModMP5RedDotSight
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iM82A1" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "M82A1" ZLWeapM82A1

				SetName "M82A1加长枪管" ZLModM82A1Barrel
				SetName "M82A1定制枪机" ZLModM82A1CustomBolt
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iVSS" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1
				SetName "VSS" ZLWeapVSS
			endif

			if GetINIFloat "NameChoices:iASVal" "zl_armanents_config.ini" == 1

original:
scn ZLACRBarrel105Script

string_var sCurrentID
string_var sModKitID

string_var sPrefix
string_var sFinalBarrel
string_var sOldBarrel
string_var sNewBarrel
string_var sFinalSight
string_var sFinalVariant

ref rCurrentWeap
ref rWeaponToAdd
ref rModToAdd

float fHealthPercent
float fBarrelSwapTimerA
float fBarrelSwapTimerB
float fBarrelSwapTimerC
float fBarrelSwapTimerD
float fAnimSpeed
float fAgilityModifier
float fQuickDrawValue

int iModsBitMask
int iAgility

begin ScriptEffectStart
	rCurrentWeap = player.GetEquippedObject 5

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar rCurrentWeap
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRUniqueAll rCurrentWeap > -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACR105BarrelKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRAll rCurrentWeap == -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACR105BarrelKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	sCurrentID = GetEditorID rCurrentWeap

	if GetDebugMode
		Print ("ID: "+sCurrentID)
	endif

	sModKitID = "Barrel105"
	if sv_find sModKitID, sCurrentID != -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACR105BarrelKit 1 1
		return
	endif
	;EIDs *must* be ordered in this format:
	;ZLWeapACRBarrelSightMuzzle

	if GetDebugMode
		Print "ACR Modkit Script Start"
	endif

	sPrefix = "ZLWeapACR"
	sNewBarrel = "105"

	if sv_find "ACOG", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "ACOG"
	elseif sv_find "Scope", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "Scope"
	endif

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar sFinalSight
	endif

	if sv_find "105", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "105"
	elseif sv_find "145", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "145"
	elseif sv_find "18", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "18"
	elseif sv_find "16", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "16"
	endif

	if eval sFinalBarrel == "105"
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACRSameAttachmentError
		player.additem ZLACR105BarrelKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	sOldBarrel = "ZLACR" + sFinalBarrel + "BarrelKit"

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar sOldBarrel
	endif

	rModToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sOldBarrel)

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar rModToAdd
	endif

	sFinalVariant = sPrefix + sNewBarrel + sFinalSight

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar sFinalVariant
	endif

	rWeaponToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sFinalVariant)

	if IsFormValid rWeaponToAdd
				if GetDebugMode
			Print "Valid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		if GetINIFltOrCreateC "Main:bACRBarrelSwapAnim" "zl_armanents_config.ini"
			;No Change
		else
			fBarrelSwapTimerA = 0.1
			fBarrelSwapTimerB = 0.2
			fBarrelSwapTimerC = 0.3
			fBarrelSwapTimerD = 0.4
		endif

		Player.SetWeaponOut 1 

		set iModsBitMask to player.GetEquippedWeaponModFlags

		if GetINIFltOrCreateC "Main:bACRBarrelSwapAnim" "zl_armanents_config.ini"
			if (Player.HasPerk QuickDraw == 1) && (GetNthPerkEntryFunction QuickDraw 0 == 38)
				fQuickDrawValue = GetNthPerkEntryValue1 QuickDraw 0
			else
				fQuickDrawValue = 1
			endif

			iAgility = Player.GetActorValue Agility
			fAgilityModifier = GetNumericGameSetting fAgilityReloadModifier

			fAnimSpeed = (1 + ((iAgility - 5) * fAgilityModifier)) * fQuickDrawValue

			fBarrelSwapTimerA = 5.0 / fAnimSpeed
			fBarrelSwapTimerB = 5.025 / fAnimSpeed
			fBarrelSwapTimerC = 5.05 / fAnimSpeed
			fBarrelSwapTimerD = 10.366667 / fAnimSpeed

			SetWeaponAnimationPath rCurrentWeap 1 1 "AnimGroupOverride\Ani_ZLACRBarrelSwap\_1stperson\2haUnEquip v1.16.kf"
		
			CallAfterSeconds 0.1 ({} => Player.SetWeaponOut 0 )	

			CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerA ({} => SetWeaponAnimationPath rCurrentWeap 1 1 "AnimGroupOverride\Ani_ZLACR\_1stperson\2haUnEquip v1.16.kf" )
		endif

		CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerA (begin function {}
			ref rWeapInvReference = Player.GetEquippedItemRef 5
			fHealthPercent = rWeapInvReference.GetItemRefCurrentHealth 2
			rWeapInvReference.RemoveMeIRAlt
		end)

		CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerB (begin function {}
			Player.AddItemHealthPercent rWeaponToAdd 1 fHealthPercent
			Player.AddItem rModToAdd 1 1
			Player.EquipItem rWeaponToAdd
			
		end)

		CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerC (begin function {}
			rWeapInvReference = Player.GetEquippedItemRef 5
			rWeapInvReference.SetWeaponRefModFlags iModsBitMask
			Player.SetWeaponOut 1
		end)

		if GetINIFltOrCreateC "Main:bACRBarrelSwapAnim" "zl_armanents_config.ini"
			CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerC ({} => SetWeaponAnimationPath rWeaponToAdd 1 1 "AnimGroupOverride\Ani_ZLACRBarrelSwap\_1stperson\2haEquip v1.16.kf" )
		endif

		if GetINIFltOrCreateC "Main:bACRBarrelSwapAnim" "zl_armanents_config.ini"
			CallAfterSeconds fBarrelSwapTimerD ({} => SetWeaponAnimationPath rWeaponToAdd 1 1 "AnimGroupOverride\Ani_ZLACR\_1stperson\2haEquip v1.16.kf")
		endif
	else
		if GetDebugMode
			Print "Invalid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		player.additem ZLACR105BarrelKit 1 1
	endif
end

ref rCurrentWeap

float fHealthPercent

int iModsBitMask

begin ScriptEffectStart
	rCurrentWeap = player.GetEquippedObject 5

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar rCurrentWeap
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRUniqueAll rCurrentWeap > -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRAll rCurrentWeap == -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	sCurrentID = GetEditorID rCurrentWeap

	if GetDebugMode
		Print ("ID: "+sCurrentID)
	endif

	;EIDs *must* be ordered in this format:
	;ZLWeapACRBarrelSightMuzzle

	if GetDebugMode
		Print "ACR Modkit Script Start"
	endif

	sPrefix = "ZLWeapACR"
	sNewWeapon = "ZLWeapACRStripped"

	if sv_find "ACOG", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "ACOG"
	elseif sv_find "Scope", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "Scope"
	endif

	if sv_find "SI", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalMuzzle = "Silencer"
	endif

	if sv_find "105", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "105"
	elseif sv_find "145", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "145"
	elseif sv_find "18", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "18"
	elseif sv_find "16", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "16"
	endif

	sOldOptic = "ZLACR" + sFinalSight + "Kit"
	sOldBarrel = "ZLACR" + sFinalBarrel + "BarrelKit"

	rBarrelToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sOldBarrel)
	rOpticToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sOldOptic)

	rWeaponToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sNewWeapon)

	if IsFormValid rWeaponToAdd
		if GetDebugMode
			Print "Valid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		ref rWeapInvReference = player.GetEquippedItemRef 5
		fHealthPercent = rWeapInvReference.GetItemRefCurrentHealth 2
	
		;player.removeitem rCurrentWeap 1 1
		set iModsBitMask to player.GetEquippedWeaponModFlags
		rWeapInvReference.RemoveMeIRAlt
	
		;Animation Here
	
		player.AddItemHealthPercent rWeaponToAdd 1 fHealthPercent
		player.additem rBarrelToAdd 1 1

			player.additem rOpticToAdd 1 1
		endif

		if iModsBitMask == 1  
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 2
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 3  
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 4  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 5  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1

			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 7  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		endif
	else
		if GetDebugMode
			Print "Invalid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
	endif
end
translation:
scn ZLACRFieldStripScript

string_var sCurrentID
string_var sModKitID

string_var sPrefix
string_var sOldOptic
string_var sOldBarrel
string_var sNewWeapon

string_var sFinalSight
string_var sFinalMuzzle
string_var sFinalBarrel

ref rCurrentWeap
ref rWeaponToAdd
ref rBarrelToAdd
ref rOpticToAdd
ref rMuzzleToAdd

float fHealthPercent

int iModsBitMask

begin ScriptEffectStart
	rCurrentWeap = player.GetEquippedObject 5

	if GetDebugMode
		PrintVar rCurrentWeap
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRUniqueAll rCurrentWeap > -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	if isRefInList ZLListACRAll rCurrentWeap == -1
		ShowMessage ZLMessageACREquipError
		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
		return
	endif

	sCurrentID = GetEditorID rCurrentWeap

	if GetDebugMode
		Print ("ID: "+sCurrentID)
	endif

	;EIDs *must* be ordered in this format:
	;ZLWeapACRBarrelSightMuzzle

	if GetDebugMode
		Print "ACR Modkit Script Start"
	endif

	sPrefix = "ZLWeapACR"
	sNewWeapon = "ZLWeapACRStripped"

	if sv_find "光学瞄准镜", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "ACOG"
	elseif sv_find "瞄准镜", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalSight = "Scope"
	endif

	if sv_find "SI", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalMuzzle = "消音器"
	endif

	if sv_find "105", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "105"
	elseif sv_find "145", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "145"
	elseif sv_find "18", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "18"
	elseif sv_find "16", sCurrentID != -1
		sFinalBarrel = "16"
	endif

	sOldOptic = "ZLACR" + sFinalSight + "组件"
	sOldBarrel = "ZLACR" + sFinalBarrel + "枪管组件"

	rBarrelToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sOldBarrel)
	rOpticToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sOldOptic)

	rWeaponToAdd = EditorIdToFormID (sNewWeapon)

	if IsFormValid rWeaponToAdd
		if GetDebugMode
			Print "Valid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		ref rWeapInvReference = player.GetEquippedItemRef 5
		fHealthPercent = rWeapInvReference.GetItemRefCurrentHealth 2
	
		;player.removeitem rCurrentWeap 1 1
		set iModsBitMask to player.GetEquippedWeaponModFlags
		rWeapInvReference.RemoveMeIRAlt
	
		;Animation Here
	
		player.AddItemHealthPercent rWeaponToAdd 1 fHealthPercent
		player.additem rBarrelToAdd 1 1
		if IsFormValid rOpticToAdd
			player.additem rOpticToAdd 1 1
		endif
		player.equipitem rWeaponToAdd

		if iModsBitMask == 1  
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 2
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 3  
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 4  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 5  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 6  
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
		elseif iModsBitMask == 7  
			player.additem ZLModACRHandguard 1 1
			player.additem ZLModACRSuppressor 1 1
			player.additem ZLModPEQLaserSight 1 1
		endif
	else
		if GetDebugMode
			Print "Invalid form!"
			PrintVar rWeaponToAdd
		endif

		player.additem ZLACRFieldStripKit 1 1
	endif
end

scn ZLTeslaSniperRifleChainEffectVTwo01Script

Short DoOnce
Short DeleteMe
Short Init
Float Timer

float zAngle
float thisX
float thisY
float targetX
float targetY
float deltaX
float deltaY
float tanZAngle


float distance
float triggerZCoord
float targetZCoord
float deltaZ
float AimAngleX
float RatioDist

;// vars for vertibird
ref TriggerObject
ref triggerActor



Begin OnLoad
	if Init == 0
		Set Timer to (0.5 + getRandomPercent * 0.003)
		Set DeleteMe to 0
		Set DoOnce to 0
		Set Init to 1
	endif
end

;///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
;// VERTIBIRD EXPLOSION STUFF
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
BEGIN ONTRIGGEREnter

	;// store who triggered us
	set TriggerObject to getActionRef
	
	;// if its in the vertibird list, blow it up!
	;IF TriggerObject.isInList DLC03TeslaExplosionList
	;		TriggerObject.do 50000
	;		IncrementScriptedChallenge TTWDLC03ChallengeVertibird
	;ENDIF
	
	if TriggerObject.isActor == 1
		if TriggerObject.GetDead == 0
			set triggerActor to getActionRef
		endif
	endif
	
END


Begin GameMode

	If DeleteMe == 1
		MarkForDelete
	endif
	
	If Timer <= 0
		Disable
		set DeleteMe to 1
	endif

	if timer < 0.3
		if DoOnce == 0
			if triggerActor.isActor == 1
				if triggerActor.GetDead == 0
					set distance to GetDistance triggerActor
					if distance > 100
						Set thisX to GetPos X
						Set thisY to GetPos Y
						Set targetX to triggerActor.GetPos X
						Set targetY to triggerActor.GetPos Y
						Set deltaX to (targetX - thisX)
						Set deltaY to (targetY - thisY)

						if deltaX < 0
							if deltaY < 0
								Set tanZAngle  to (deltaY / deltaX)
								Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1
								Set zAngle to 270 - zAngle
							else
								Set tanZAngle  to (deltaY / -deltaX)
								Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1
								Set zAngle to zAngle - 90
							endif
						else
							if deltaY < 0
								Set tanZAngle  to (-deltaY / deltaX)
								Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1
								Set zAngle to zAngle + 90
							else
								Set tanZAngle  to (deltaY / deltaX)
								Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1
								Set zAngle to 90 - zAngle
							endif
						endif
	
						set triggerZCoord to GetPos Z 						;;// you want the z component of the trigger’s location
						set targetZCoord to triggerActor.GetPos Z		;;// you want the z component of the target’s location

						set targetZCoord to targetZCoord + 64 			;; Aim for the middle of the target (fudge)

						set deltaZ to (triggerZCoord - targetZCoord)
						set RatioDist to (deltaZ / distance)
						set AimAngleX to Sin RatioDist 1 					;// the extra 1 is what tells the script to use arcsine and not sine

						if deltaY < 0
							Set AimAngleX to (0 - AimAngleX)
						endif
						SetAngle X AimAngleX

						setangle z zAngle

						FireWeapon ZLWeapTeslaSniperRifleChainEffect01
						set DoOnce to 1
					endIf
				endIf
			endif
		endIf
	endif

	Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
End
translation:
